name: EverHelper
tag_list: bookmarks, notes, sync, dials, screenshots, screen-capture, reading, education, research, annotate, highlights
overview:
Everhelper comprises several separate services joint under one user account.

1) Eversync is a Firefox/Chrome app for syncing and backing up bookmarks and FVD Speed Dial dials.

iPhone and Android apps are currently under development. You also get a Web interface allowing you to manage your bookmarks online. The service was launched in 2012.

2) Nimbus is a set of tools for saving and editing content.

Web interface and browser apps are currently under development. Nimbus, in its turn, comprises the following components:

a) Nimbus Note is a set of tools for creating and syncing notes. The notes can be shared with your workmates and also support group collaboration on them. A Chrome app is already available. Android and iOS apps are currently under development.

b) Nimbus ScreenCapture apps for Firefox and Chrome are for capturing screenshots and editing/annotating them.

c) Nimbus Research apps for Chrome and Firefox are for adding notes to websites and documents. The annotated projects can be shared and worked on in groups.

3) Bereader is a set of apps and a Web interface that allow you to clear all unnecessary information away from the web page you are reading. The content clearing algorithm is based on a unique ‘smart’ parser built in-house.
